column2:
Hi there! So glad you're here! Riley has gotten stuck in this AI trap.
Want to help us get access so we can help her get out?

As you can see it's a tricky situation! If anyone can get through this challenge, it’s Riley. 
But that doesn't mean it's going to be easy for any of us.

I remember this trap! I set this trap 2,024 blue moons ago. So this is indeed highly irregular. 
I should have foreseen that Riley would find that portal.

So give me a minute. This is going to take some careful attention 
There’s no way I will let this box I myself made bring our Riley to any harm!
OK, hope you can come back soon!
